Class GameBoardController

  • java.lang.Object

    public class GameBoardController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    The functions and inner workings of the GUI. The center for most of the functions of the Java program such as the sounds, slider, button controlling and the board itself. For more detailed explanations and code:
    See Also:
    Sound, GameSpeedControl, GameBoardModel
